revised_title: Discussion on the Physiology of the Soul and Instinct
tldr: This article presents a discussion on the physiology of the soul and instinct, distinguishing it from materialism. It also includes a response to E. T. Quimby, Wm. Chauvenet, R. D. Allen, and A. T. Bledsoe, as well as a commentary on Dr. Hunter's "Our Indian Hussu-mans" regarding their conscience and potential rebellion against the Queen.
